"That was great! You make an excellent H: "A Hunter's prime quality is his ability to survive. Simply put, we're the definition of tough."
"We're the living shields of any party because we stand up front, soaking up damage. We even have skills to get hostiles to focus on us!"
"But protection isn't our only role. We have attacks perfect for any situation, and we can clear the way in a flash!"
